commit.message:
PlainSocketImpl.java: Reformatting.

2003-06-21  Michael Koch  <konqueror@gmx.de>

	* java/net/PlainSocketImpl.java:
	Reformatting.
	(static): New implicit method.
	(read): Made package private.
	(write): Likewise.

From-SVN: r68304
